m_szDocTitle: Vision Industries Announces Request to Prototype 32 Tyrano(TM) Trucks - Oil & Gas 360
m_szDocSumamry: Vision Industries Announces Request to Prototype 32 Tyrano(TM) Trucks  November 28, 2014 - 10:41 AM EST close yes               Vision Industries Announces Request to Prototype 32 Tyrano(TM) Trucks LONG BEACH, CA / ACCESSWIRE / November 28, 2014 / Vision Industries (OTC: VIICQ) received an official request from a Canadian Energy Solutions Company to prototype 32 Tyrano(TM) trucks at a remote mining site in Northern Canada. The mining site has a massive wind turbine facility which can produce hydrogen through an electrolyzer. With the capability to produce on-site hydrogen, the mining company h
